Package org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.cost

Interface ICostEstimate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComputationCostEstimator, DistinctCostEstimator, HybridCostEstimator, MemoryCostEstimator
    public interface ICostEstimate
extends Serializable
    A cost estimator interface. Cost here is either memory based or computation based. It is used to estimate the cost of a specific compression layout.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static org.apache.commons.logging.Log LOG  
      static long serialVersionUID  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getCostOfColumnGroup​(CompressedSizeInfoColGroup g)
      If the instruction does not care about the inter column group cost, such as in memory cost or in computation cost of right or left matrix multiplication we simply estimate the cost of individual column groups.
      double getUncompressedCost​(CompressedSizeInfoColGroup g)
      Calculate the cost of execution if uncompressed.
      boolean shouldAnalyze​(CompressedSizeInfoColGroup g1, CompressedSizeInfoColGroup g2)
      Decide if the column groups should be analysed, or the worst case join should be expected.

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:

      • LOG

        static final org.apache.commons.logging.Log LOG

    • Method Detail

      • getUncompressedCost

        double getUncompressedCost​(CompressedSizeInfoColGroup g)
        Calculate the cost of execution if uncompressed. This is used as an optimization goal to at least achieve, since if the uncompressed cost of calculation is lower than in compressed space we don't want to compress.
        Parameters:
        g - A potential column group to compare to.
        Returns:
        The uncompressed cost.

      • getCostOfColumnGroup

        double getCostOfColumnGroup​(CompressedSizeInfoColGroup g)
        If the instruction does not care about the inter column group cost, such as in memory cost or in computation cost of right or left matrix multiplication we simply estimate the cost of individual column groups.
        Parameters:
        g - Column group to estimate the cost of
        Returns:
        The Cost of this column group

      • shouldAnalyze

        boolean shouldAnalyze​(CompressedSizeInfoColGroup g1,
                      CompressedSizeInfoColGroup g2)
        Decide if the column groups should be analysed, or the worst case join should be expected. This is use full if the column groups are very small and the in practice difference between joining or not is small. Or in the other case where there is some obvious reason why these two groups does not fit together.
        Parameters:
        g1 - Group 1
        g2 - Group 2
        Returns:
        If the joining should be analyzed.
